reviewText: If your looking for a real,simple and amazingly strong way of life that can and will change you and others. Then this dvd and cd will show you a glimpse of an unabashed Love for Both God and man. The music is raw and relevant addressing the reality of suffering and loss and the stories shared both on the dvd and cd will at the very least give you something to think about,and could very well wind up drawing you into The Irresistible Revolution. Love is the weapon they use and victory is coming.
